1: @@//yi <mistake>gi</mistake> <mistake>med// stong</mistake> pa chen po yi <mistake>gi</mistake> <mistake>lnga//thig</mistake> le stong pa yi <mistake>gi</mistake> drug / rnam pa thams cad rnam pa <mistake>med// bcu</mistake> drug <mistake>phyed</mistake> phyed thig le <mistake>'chang//cha</mistake> med cha ldan las 'das <mistake>pa// bsam</mistake> gtan
2: bzhi pa'i rtse mo <mistake>'chang//bsam</mistake> gtan yan lag kun shes <mistake>shing//ting</mistake> 'dzin rigs dang rgyud rig <mistake>pa//ting</mistake> <mistake>'din</mistake> <mistake>su</mistake> <mistake>st</mistake> <mistake>shu</mistake> ya <mistake>mchog /longs</mistake> spyod <mistake>rdzogs</mistake> sku kun <mistake>gya</mistake> <mistake>rgyal// sprul</mistake> pa'i sku ste <mistake>su</mistake> yi
3: <mistake>mchog/ sangs</mistake> rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang <mistake>ba//phyogs</mistake> bcur sprul <mistake>pa</mistake> sna tshogs <mistake>'gyed//di</mistake> bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed <mistake>pa//lha</mistake> yi dbang po lha yi lha // lha min dbang po sbyin byed <mistake>bdag /lha</mistake> yi <mistake>zla</mistake> ma 'chi
4: med <mistake>dbang//rab</mistake> 'joms rab 'joms <mistake>dbang</mistake> phyug <mistake>go/srid</mistake> pa'i dgon pa las brgal <mistake>ba//ston</mistake> pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i <mistake>bla//'jig</mistake> rten phyogs bcur rab grags <mistake>pa//chos</mistake> kyi sbyin bdag che ba <mistake>po//</mistake>
5: byams pa'i go <mistake>cha</mistake> chas pa <mistake>ste//snying</mistake> rje yi ni ya lad <mistake>bgos//shes</mistake> rab ral gri mda' <mistake>ghu</mistake> <mistake>thogs//nyon</mistake> mongs mi shes <mistake>g.yul</mistake> ngo <mistake>sel//dpa'</mistake> bo <mistake>bdung</mistake> dgra bdud 'dul <mistake>ba//bdud</mistake> <mistake>zhi'i</mistake> 'jigs
6: pa mthar byed <mistake>pa//bdud</mistake> dpung thams cad pham par <mistake>byed//rdzogs</mistake> pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten <mistake>'dren//mchod</mistake> 'os bstod 'os phyag gi <mistake>gnas//rtag</mistake> <mistake>tu</mistake> <mistake>rimi</mistake> gro bya ba'i <mistake>'os//bkur</mistake> 'os rjed par
7: bya ba'i <mistake>'os// phyag</mistake> <mistake>byar</mistake> 'os pa bla ma <mistake>mchog /'jig</mistake> rten gsum po gom gcig <mistake>bgrod//mkha'</mistake> <mistake>lar</mistake> mtha' med rnam par <mistake>gnon// gsum</mistake> rig gtsang ma dag pa <mistake>ste //mngon</mistake> shes drug ldan rjes
8: dran <mistake>drug /byang</mistake> chub sems dpa' sems dpa' <mistake>che//rdzu</mistake> 'phrul chen po 'jig rten <mistake>'das//shes</mistake> rab pha rol phyin pa'i <mistake>mtha'//shes</mistake> rab kyi ni de nyid <mistake>thob//bdag</mistake> rig gzhan rig thams cad <mistake>pa//kun</mistake>
